skills.name: Chrome DevTools
skills.pattern: F12, Cmd+Opt+I, inspect element, console

skills.name: Elements Panel
skills.pattern: Inspect HTML, modify live, CSS styles, computed

skills.name: CSS Editing
skills.pattern: Edit styles live, add properties, toggle, copy

skills.name: DOM Breakpoints
skills.pattern: Subtree modifications, attribute changes, node removal

skills.name: Console Panel
skills.pattern: console.log, error, warn, table, group

skills.name: Console API
skills.pattern: console.time(), trace(), assert(), count()

skills.name: Console Utilities
skills.pattern: $0 selected, $() querySelector, copy(), keys()

skills.name: Sources Panel
skills.pattern: View files, set breakpoints, step through code

skills.name: Breakpoints
skills.pattern: Line breakpoints, conditional, logpoints

skills.name: Step Debugging
skills.pattern: Step over F10, step into F11, step out, continue

skills.name: Watch Expressions
skills.pattern: Add expressions to watch, evaluate as you step

skills.name: Call Stack
skills.pattern: View function call chain, click to navigate

skills.name: Source Maps
skills.pattern: Map minified to source, debug TypeScript/JSX

skills.name: Network Panel
skills.pattern: View requests, headers, response, timing

skills.name: Network Filtering
skills.pattern: XHR, Fetch, JS, CSS, filter by URL

skills.name: Request Details
skills.pattern: Headers, payload, response, timing, initiator

skills.name: Throttling
skills.pattern: Slow 3G, offline, custom throttle profiles

skills.name: Performance Panel
skills.pattern: Record, flame chart, FPS, main thread activity

skills.name: Flame Charts
skills.pattern: Call hierarchy, time spent, identify bottlenecks

skills.name: Performance Insights
skills.pattern: Core Web Vitals, recommendations, issues

skills.name: Memory Panel
skills.pattern: Heap snapshots, allocation timeline, memory leaks

skills.name: Heap Snapshot
skills.pattern: Take snapshot, compare, find retained objects

skills.name: Memory Leaks
skills.pattern: Detached DOM, growing heap, allocation timeline

skills.name: Application Panel
skills.pattern: localStorage, sessionStorage, cookies, IndexedDB

skills.name: Service Workers
skills.pattern: View registered, update, unregister, offline

skills.name: Cache Storage
skills.pattern: View cached assets, delete, test offline

skills.name: Lighthouse
skills.pattern: Performance, accessibility, SEO, PWA audits

skills.name: Device Mode
skills.pattern: Mobile viewport, device frames, touch simulation

skills.name: Remote Debugging
skills.pattern: chrome://inspect, USB debugging, real device

skills.name: DevTools Tips
skills.pattern: Cmd+P open file, Cmd+Shift+P commands, snippets
